rows.label: tlk00340104_msg0001
rows.name:
I knew Boss had an aversion to desk
work, but I didn't think it was quite
this bad...

rows.label: tlk00340104_msg0002
rows.name:
Boss left us with so much paperwork,
we're kinda swamped right now.

rows.label: tlk00340104_msg0003
rows.name:
Is that why he was always so keen to
get out of here? Because he didn't
want to deal with it?
